schermer.color

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • schermer.color.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Color class is used to encapsulate a single color.

    Constructors:

    named(String): Constructs a color by looking up the given name in a color database.

    fromAwtColor(java.awt.Color): Constructs a color from a given awt.Color instance.

    Color#parseRgbHex(int): Constructs a color from a 6-digit RGB hex value string.

    fromRgbHex(int): Constructs a color from a 6-digit RGB hex value.

    fromRgbOctet(int, int, int): Constructs a color from RGB values in the range 0-255.

    fromRgb(float, float, float): Constructs a color from RGB proportions.

    fromRgbPercent(int, int, int): Constructs a color from RGB proportions as percents.

    fromRgbVector(Vector3f): Construcs a color from an RGB component vector.

    fromHsv(float, float, float): Constructs a color from HSV proportions.

    fromHsvPercent(float, int, int): Constructs a color from HSV proportions as percents.

    fromHsl(float, float, float): Constructs a color from HSL proportions.

    fromHslPercent(float, int, int): Constructs a color from RSL proportions as percents.

    fromCmyk(float, float, float, float): Constructs a color from CMYK proportions.

    fromCmykPercent(int, int, int, int): Constructs a color from CMYK proportions as percents.

    Version:
    0.2.2 (8 July 2015)
    Author:
    Skylor R Schermer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • lighten

        public Color lighten(float amount)
        Returns a copy of the color lightened by the given amount. The amount is taken as the proportion (in the range 0-1) of the difference between the color and white.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to lighten by
        Returns:
        a lightened copy of the color

      • darken

        public Color darken(float amount)
        Returns a copy of the color darkened by the given amount. The amount is taken as the proportion (in the range 0-1) of the difference between the color and black.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to darken by
        Returns:
        a darkened copy of the color

      • saturate

        public Color saturate(float amount)
        Returns a copy of the color saturated by the given amount. The amount is taken as the ratio in the range 0-1 of the proportion by which to increase the saturation.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to saturate by
        Returns:
        a saturated copy of the color

      • desaturate

        public Color desaturate(float amount)
        Returns a copy of the color desaturated by the given amount. The amount is taken as the ratio in the range 0-1 of the proportion by which to decrease the saturation.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to desaturate by
        Returns:
        a desaturated copy of the color

      • shiftHue

        public Color shiftHue(float degrees)
        Returns a copy of the color with the hue shifted by the given number of degrees.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the number of degrees
        Returns:
        a hue shifted copy of the color

      • invertRgb

        public Color invertRgb()
        returns an RGB inverted copy of the color.
        Returns:
        an inverted copy of the color.

      • reduce

        public Color reduce(float precision)
        Returns a copy of the color 'rounded' to a nearby color. Each RGB component will be rounded down to the given precision.
        Parameters:
        precision - the precision that each component will be rounded to
        Returns:
        a reduced copy of the color

      • isGrayScale

        public boolean isGrayScale()
        Returns true if the color is a gray scale color, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the color is a gray scale color, false otherwise

      • dropChannel

        public Color dropChannel(schermer.color.Channel channel)
        Returns a copy of the color with the given channel component dropped. Returns the color unchanged if a null channel is provided.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to drop
        Returns:
        a copy of the color with the given channel component dropped

      • isolateChannel

        public Color isolateChannel(schermer.color.Channel channel)
        Returns a copy of the color with only the given channel component. Returns black if a null channel is provided.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to drop
        Returns:
        a copy of the color with the complementary channels component dropped

      • rgbDistanceTo

        public float rgbDistanceTo(Color color)
        Returns the distance between two colors in the RGB color space.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to get the distance to
        Returns:
        the distance between the given color

      • hslDistanceTo

        public float hslDistanceTo(Color color)
        Returns the distance between two colors in the HSL color space.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to get the distance to
        Returns:
        the distance between the given color

        public Color transform(schermer.math.Matrix3f transformation)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a new Color
